metadata.title: CVE-2024-35927 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: drm:Check output polling initialized before disabling Indrm_kms_helper_poll_disable() check if output polling support isinitialized before disabling polling. If not flag this as a warning.Additionally in drm_mode_config_helper_suspend() anddrm_mode_config_helper_resume() calls, that re the callers of thesefunctions, avoid invoking them if polling is not initialized.
